title: When Are We All Getting KF Tattoos? - The Kinda Funny Morning Show 05.09.18
description:
Thanks to Shari's Berries for sponsoring this episode. Use code: KFMS at http://berries.com

Thanks to Simple Contacts.. Save $30 on your first Simple Contacts order at http://www.simplecontacts.com/kindafunny and use promo code: kindafunny.

Greg and Nick talk Comcast purchasing 20th Century Fox, Patty Jenkins gets PAID (son), and the KF Team gets tattoos? Special thanks to @marionotbros for that sweet nasty thumbnail!

Time Stamps -
-Comcast prepares all cash bid to gate crash disney fox deal (16:10 mins)
-Disney teases new franchise beyond avengers (23:52 mins)
-Patty Jenkins earning 9 times the salary for wonder woman 2 (26:10 mins)
-Jordan Peele reveals title of next film (35:25 mins)
-The original avengers stars got matching tatoos to celebrate the release of the movie (40:45 mins)
Thanks to https://Twitter.com/kumailh for our timestamps!

Subscribe! http://www.youtube.com/kindafunny?sub_confirmation=1

Support us and get the shows early here! http://www.patreon.com/kindafunny

Check out our store! http://www.kindafunny.com/store

Follow us on Twitter!
Greg - http://www.twitter.com/GameOverGreggy
Tim - http://www.twitter.com/TimGettys
Nick - http://www.twitter.com/Nick_Scarpino
Kinda Funny - http://www.twitter.com/KindaFunnyVids

Every day Greg Miller, Tim Gettys, and Nick Scarpino talk about the biggest stories in nerd culture.
